title: Create worldtime CLI tool displaying real-time world clocks
description: Build a standalone Go CLI tool 'worldtime' that displays real-time clocks for major world cities with dynamic terminal updates. Shows local time plus configurable world cities.
acceptance_criteria: Shows time for major world cities (New York, London, Tokyo, Shanghai, Sydney, Paris, Dubai, etc.)
Dynamically updates every second in the terminal
Follows monorepo conventions (own go.mod, Makefile, cmd/ + internal/ layout)

tasks.title: Scaffold worldtime project structure
tasks.description: Create worldtime/ directory with go.mod, Makefile, cmd/worldtime/main.go, internal/ packages

tasks.title: Implement core time display logic
tasks.description: Implement timezone loading, formatting, and dynamic terminal refresh

tasks.title: Build and test
tasks.description: Verify build, run tests, ensure binary works correctly

design.summary: Simple Go CLI using ANSI escape codes for terminal refresh. No external dependencies beyond Go stdlib.
decisions: Use Go stdlib time package for timezone handling
Use ANSI escape codes for dynamic terminal updates (no external TUI library)
Update display every second via time.Ticker
steps: Implement clock model with city/timezone pairs
Implement terminal renderer with ANSI clear + redraw
Add signal handling for clean exit

worldtime/internal/clock/clock.go - City model, time formatting, ANSI renderer
